Original program:

```
ANSWERS0=VQA(video=VIDEO,question="Why is the man wearing a hat?")
ANSWER0=SELECT(question="Why is the man wearing a hat?",information=ANSWERS0,choices=CHOICES)
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```

